name: Top 10 Stock Gainers Today
description: Find stocks with highest price gains today
query: Market Capitalization > 1000 AND Price to earning > 0 AND Price to earning < 50

name: Top 10 Stock Losers Today
description: Find stocks with highest price drops today
query: Market Capitalization > 1000 AND Price to earning > 0

name: Highest Volume Stocks
description: Stocks with exceptionally high trading volume

name: Highest Dividend Yield Stocks
query: Dividend yield > 3 AND Market Capitalization > 10000 AND Debt to equity < 1

name: Lowest P/E Ratio Stocks
description: Value stocks with low P/E ratios
query: Price to earning > 0 AND Price to earning < 15 AND Market Capitalization > 5000 AND Return on equity > 15

name: Sector Performance Analysis
query: Market Capitalization > 1000 AND Return on equity > 10 AND Return on capital employed > 12

name: High ROCE Companies
query: Return on capital employed > 25 AND Market Capitalization > 5000 AND Debt to equity < 0.5

name: Debt-Free Companies
description: Companies with minimal or no debt
query: Debt to equity < 0.1 AND Market Capitalization > 1000 AND Current ratio > 1.5

name: High Growth Stocks
query: Sales growth > 20 AND Profit growth > 25 AND Return on equity > 20 AND Price to earning < 30

name: Value Investment Picks
query: Price to earning > 0 AND Price to earning < 12 AND Price to book value < 1.5 AND Return on equity > 15 AND Debt to equity < 0.5

name: Quality Stock Screener
query: Return on equity > 15 AND Return on capital employed > 15 AND Debt to equity < 1 AND Interest coverage ratio > 5 AND Current ratio > 1
